# Schizophrenia 2014 

**Last updated:** `r Sys.Date()`

**Code version:** `r system("git log -1 --format='%H'", intern = TRUE)`

The GWAS summary statistics corresponding to @scz_nature_2014 are provided by the [Psychiatric Genomics Consortium (PGC)](http://www.med.unc.edu/pgc/results-and-downloads).

The basic information about these datasets is available [here](http://www.med.unc.edu/pgc/files/resultfiles/scz2.readme.pdf).

The following analyses have been performed on Schizophrenia (SCZ) 2014 dataset.

- GSEA Round 1 (Section \@ref(scz2014-1))
- GSEA Round 2 (Section \@ref(scz2014-2))
- GTEx Analysis (Section \@ref(scz2014-3))
